title: Distribution of consumer transactions worldwide 2018 , by payment channel
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Share of respondents is 2.0.
The minimum Response Smart home device has got 20.5 times less Share of respondents than the maximum Response In-store.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response In-store has the highest Share of respondents and Smart home device has the lowest Share of respondents.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 11 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response In-store and lowest at Response Smart home device.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response .
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
Share of respondents at Response In-store is 41.0 , second place is  at 41.0, and thirdly is Buy buttons at 9.0.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Response Smart home device, Wearables / contactless, and Other.
The Response Smart home device tends to be 4.47 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents is 101.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
